shoe_name: New Balance FuelCell SuperComp Elite v4
pros: Incredibly comfortable ride; Ideal for fast-paced long runs; Finally features a Pebax midsole; Marathon-ready performance; Exceptional leg-saving cushioning; Premium upper material; Amazing for forefoot strikers; Roomy toebox in a supershoe!
cons: Needs to lose weight; Subpar tongue; Feels bottom-heavy
RR_verdict: New Balance has finally entered the competitive supershoe landscape with their FuelCell SuperComp Elite v4, which boasts a brand-new Pebax midsole alongside a full-length carbon plate. This setup offers supreme energy return and a leg-saving ride with its almost 40 mm stack height. Although it presents a heftier profile compared to its competitors, we were impressed by its unmatched comfort and plush ride, making it an outstanding choice for runners who desire a smoother, more pleasant racing shoe.
awards: Top pick in best marathon running shoes, Top pick in best New Balance running shoes, Top 15% in New Balance running shoes, Top 7% most popular running shoes
